Detailed Description

Object tracer based on single line position counter.

This single counter will be 'multiplied' using set of queues.

Definition at line 17 of file CSingleCountTracerDriverBase.h.

virtual bool ilolv::CSingleCountTracerDriverBase::SetCounterQueuesCount ( int  count) [virtual]

Set number of needed counter queues.

Single queue generate interrupt if first in queue counter value is reached. After this first element will be removed from queue.

Implements ilolv::CTracerDriverBase.

virtual void ilolv::CSingleCountTracerDriverBase::SetNextSinglePositionEvent ( const I_DWORD *  eventPositionPtr) [protected, pure virtual]

Set or remove position of next position event.

Parameters:
eventPositionPtroptional position value. If this is NULL, position of next event will be removed.
